headline: Everest Group Appoints Jim Williamson as Permanent Chief Executive Officer
summary: HAMILTON, Bermuda, January 22, 2025--Everest Group, Ltd., a global underwriting leader providing best-in-class property, casualty and specialty insurance and reinsurance solutions, today announced that its Board of Directors has appointed Jim Williamson as President and Chief Executive Officer, effective immediately.
